spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Acererak是一个20级的施法者。他的法术能力是智力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%））。Acererak准备了以下巫师法术。

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Acererak携带{@item Staff of the Forgotten One|ToA}。他戴着（1%），并有一个（2%）被他控制。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果Acererak的拯救动作失败，他可以选择成功。

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: 当Acererak的生命值下降到0时，他的身体会变成灰尘，他的装备也会被留下。Acererak在{@dice 1d10}天后获得一个新的身体，恢复他所有的命中率并再次变得活跃。新的身体出现在Acerak的法器的5英尺范围内，法器的位置是隐藏的。

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: Acererak在面对任何变成亡灵的效果时都有优势。

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 15}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d6})的寒冷伤害，并且目标必须在{@dc 20}宪法救赎中成功，否则会被{@condition paralyzed}1分钟。目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，成功后结束对自己的影响。

action.name: Staff (+3 Quarterstaff)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})重击伤害加10 ({@damage 3d6})坏死伤害，或者双手使用时，8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})重击伤害加10 ({@damage 3d6})坏死伤害。

action.name: Invoke Curse
entries: 在持有被遗忘者之杖的时候，阿克雷拉克会消耗它的一个电荷，并以他周围60英尺内他能看到的一个生物为目标。目标必须在宪法规定的投掷中成功，否则将被诅咒。在诅咒结束之前，目标不能恢复命中率，并且容易受到坏死的伤害。{@spell Greater restoration}, {@spell remove curse}, 或类似的魔法结束对目标的诅咒。

legendary.name: At-Will Spell
entries: Acererak施展他的一个随心所欲的法术。

legendary.name: Melee Attack
entries: Acererak使用麻痹之触或用他的法杖进行一次近战攻击。

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Acererak将他的目光投向他周围10英尺内他能看到的一个生物。目标必须对这个魔法做一个{@dc 20}的智慧救赎，否则就会变成{@condition frightened}，持续1分钟。2%）的目标可以在每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。如果一个目标的救赎成功或效果结束，该目标在接下来的24小时内对Acererak的凝视免疫。

legendary.name: Talisman of the Sphere (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Acererak使用他的{@item Talisman of the Sphere}将他控制的{@item Sphere of Annihilation}移动至90英尺。

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 在Acererak周围20英尺范围内的每个生物都必须对这个魔法进行一次{@dc 20}的宪法救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到42({@damage 12d6})的坏死伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 矮人天生的法术能力是智慧。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何材料成分。

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: 矮人对毒药的蓄力攻击有优势。

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 3}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: 矮人对毒药的蓄力攻击有优势。

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 3}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 阿尔达尼人可以呼吸空气和水。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 阿尔达尼用它的爪子进行两次攻击。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})砍击伤害，目标为{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 11})。阿尔达尼有两个爪子，每个爪子只能抓取一个目标。

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: 阿尔米拉吉在依靠听觉或视觉的智慧检查中具有优势。

trait.name: Familiar
entries: 在DM的允许下，{@spell find familiar}法术可以召唤一个almiraj。

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: 如果伤害将僵尸的命中率降至0，它必须做一个宪法救赎动作，DC为5+所受伤害，除非伤害是辐射或来自关键打击。如果成功，僵尸会下降到1点生命值。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 6}击中，达到10英尺，对一个目标造成{@h}18({@damage 4d6 + 4})重击伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须在一个{@dc 14}力量救赎中成功，或者被击倒{@condition prone}。

immune.preNote: While wearing the Ring of Winter:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: 阿图斯戴上了（%0%）。他和戒指不能被占卜魔法锁定，也不能通过魔法探查传感器感知到。当阿图斯适应并佩戴这枚戒指时，他不再衰老，并对寒冷伤害和极度寒冷的影响免疫。
阿图斯挥舞着{@item Bookmark|toa}一把具有额外魔法属性的+3匕首。作为一个额外的动作，Artus可以在与匕首配合时激活以下任何一项属性，前提是他已经拔出武器。

items: 使镶嵌在匕首柄上的蓝色宝石在20英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外20英尺范围内发出暗光，或者使宝石变暗。
把匕首变成一个指南针，放在手掌上时，指向北方。
从匕首上施放（%0%）。一旦这个属性被使用，在下一个黎明之前不能再次使用。
从匕首上施放（%0%）（保存（%1%））。咒语的范围增加到90英尺，但它只针对属于野兽的蜘蛛。一旦这个属性被使用，在下一个黎明前都不能再次使用。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 阿图斯用书签或他的长弓进行三次攻击。

action.name: Bookmark (+3 Dagger)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw}{@hit 5}击中，范围150/600英尺，对一个目标造成{@h}6({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Ring of Winter
entries: 冬日之戒有12次充电，每天黎明时分恢复所有已消耗的充电。当阿图斯戴上这枚戒指时，他可以消耗必要数量的电荷来激活以下属性之一。

items: Artus可以消耗1个电荷并使用戒指来降低以他能看到的300英尺范围内的一个点为中心的120英尺半径的球体的温度。该区域的温度每分钟下降20度，最低为华氏-30度。一旦温度降到32度以下，表面就会开始形成霜和冰。这个效果是永久性的，除非阿图斯使用戒指作为一个动作来结束这个效果，这时该区域的温度会以每分钟10度的速度恢复正常。

阿特斯可以通过消耗必要的电荷，从戒指中施放下列法术之一（法术保存（%0%））。{@spell Bigby's hand} (2次充电)手由冰制成，对寒冷伤害免疫，并像紧握的拳头一样造成重击伤害而不是力量伤害，{@spell cone of cold} (2次充电)，{@spell flesh to stone||flesh to ice} (3次充电)。除了目标变成坚硬的冰块，并具有石头的密度和耐久性，{@spell ice storm} (2次收费), {@spell Otiluke's freezing sphere} (3次收费), {@spell sleet storm} (1次收费), {@spell spike growth} (1次收费)，尖刺是由冰组成，或{@spell wall of ice} (2次收费)。

阿图斯可以消耗必要的费用，用戒指创造一个无生命的冰块（2个费用）或一个有生命的冰生物（4个费用）。这个冰块不能有任何活动部件，必须能装进一个10英尺的立方体中，并且具有金属或石头的密度和耐久性（阿图斯选择）。冰雪生物必须以挑战等级为2或以下的野兽为模型。冰雪生物的统计数据与它所模拟的野兽相同，但有以下变化：该生物是一种结构体，易受火灾伤害，对寒冷和毒药伤害免疫，并对以下条件免疫：{@condition charmed}、{@condition exhaustion}、{@condition frightened}、{@condition paralyzed}、{@condition petrified}和{@condition poisoned}。冰雪生物只听从其创造者的命令。该物体或生物出现在阿特斯60英尺范围内的一个无人空间。24小时后或当它的命中率下降到0时，它将融化成一滩普通的水。在极热的情况下，它在融化时每分钟会损失5({@dice 1d10})点命中率。如果有必要的话，可以使用《地下城管理员指南》第8章的指南来确定无生命物体的命中率。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 阿莎拉是一个5级的施法者。她的法术能力是智慧（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%））。阿莎拉准备了以下德鲁伊法术。

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: 如果阿拉科克拉在飞行中，朝着目标直接俯冲至少30英尺，然后用近战武器攻击击中它，攻击会对目标造成额外的3（（%0%））伤害。

trait.name: Dance of the Seven Winds
entries: 阿夏拉知道一种叫做 "七风之舞 "的仪式，它可以暂时赋予多达10个非飞行生物以神奇的飞行能力。这个仪式需要10分钟才能完成，只能由阿拉科克拉长老来完成，并且需要一朵黑兰花作为材料成分。
阿莎拉必须将兰花磨成粉末，吸入兰花，并在其他七个阿拉科克拉向阿卡的风公爵吟唱祈祷的时候，不间断地围绕仪式的受益人转圈跳舞。舞蹈结束后，阿莎拉的翅膀消失，她失去了飞行的能力。仪式的受益者每人获得30英尺的神奇飞行速度（允许他们每小时飞行4英里）。这个好处持续3天，之后阿莎拉的翅膀重新出现，她重新获得了飞行的能力。

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})砍击伤害。

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 4}命中，距离5英尺或范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Summon Air Elemental
entries: 五个在30英尺范围内的阿拉科拉可以用魔法召唤一个（%0%）。五个人中的每一个都必须在连续的三个回合中使用其行动和运动来进行空中舞蹈，并且在这样做的时候必须保持（%1%）（就像（%2%）的法术）。当五个人都完成了他们的第三轮舞蹈后，元素出现在他们周围60英尺内的一个无人空间。它对他们很友好，并服从他们的口令。它将持续1小时，直到它或它的所有召唤者死亡，或者直到它的任何一个召唤者以额外行动将其解散。召唤者在完成短暂的休息之前，不能再进行这种舞蹈。当元素回到空气元素界时，在它周围5英尺范围内的任何阿拉科克拉都可以和它一起返回。

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: 当刺客藤蔓保持不动，它与普通植物没有区别。

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达20英尺，一个生物。{@h}目标受到11({@damage 2d6 + 4})重击伤害，而且是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 14})。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是{@condition restrained}，并且在它的每个回合开始时受到21({@damage 6d6})的毒伤害。藤蔓一次只能束缚一个目标。

action.name: Entangling Vines
entries: 刺客藤蔓可以使它周围30英尺范围内15英尺方圆的地面上的普通藤蔓和根系具有活力。这些植物将该区域的地面变成（%0%）。当效果开始时，在该区域的生物必须成功地进行一个{@dc 13}力量救赎，否则就会被缠住的藤蔓和根系缠住{@condition restrained}。被植物缠住的生物（3%）可以用它的行动来做一个（4%）力量（运动）检查，如果检查成功，就可以释放自己。该效果在1分钟后结束，或者当刺客藤蔓死亡或再次使用纠缠藤蔓的时候。

monster.name: Atropal
languages: understands Celestial but utters only obscene nonsense

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 阿托帕尔在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面具有优势。

trait.name: Negative Energy Aura
entries: 在阿托帕尔30英尺范围内的生物无法恢复命中率，任何在阿托帕尔30英尺范围内开始其回合的生物都会受到10（（%0%））的坏死伤害。如果阿托帕尔被（%1%）击中，施法者可以切断阿托帕尔的脐带，而不是造成伤害。如果它的脐带被切断，阿托帕尔就会失去这个特性。

trait.name: Turn Resistance Aura
entries: 阿托帕尔和它周围30英尺范围内的任何其他亡灵生物在面对任何变成亡灵的效果时都有优势。

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d6})坏死性伤害。

action.name: Ray of Cold
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12}击中，范围120英尺，一个目标。{@h}21 ({@damage 6d6})寒冷伤害。

action.name: Life Drain
entries: 阿托帕尔的目标是它能看到的120英尺内的一个生物。目标必须在一个{@dc 19}宪法救赎中成功，如果救赎失败，将受到36({@damage 8d8})的坏死伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。阿托帕尔恢复的点数等于所受伤害的一半。

action.name: Summon Wraith {@recharge}
entries: 阿托帕尔召唤一个{@creature wraith}，在它能看到的无人空间里，在它的30英尺范围内实体化。缠绕者服从其召唤者的命令，不能被任何其他生物所控制。当它的生命值下降到0或召唤者死亡时，裹尸人就会消失。

legendary.name: Touch
entries: 阿托帕尔进行了一次触摸攻击。

legendary.name: Ray of Cold (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 阿托帕尔使用它的寒冰之光。

legendary.name: Wail (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 阿托帕尔发出一声枯萎的哀号。任何在阿托帕尔120英尺范围内的生物，如果能听到这声哀号，必须在宪法规定的投掷中获得成功，否则将获得1级的（%1%）。

trait.name: Feline Agility
entries: 当钉子袋在其战斗回合中移动时，他的速度可以加倍，直到该回合结束。一旦他使用这个特性，钉子袋就不能再次使用，直到他在某个回合中移动0英尺。

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: 在他的第一个回合中，钉子袋在对任何还没有进行回合的生物进行攻击时有优势。钉子袋对{@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}的生物的任何一击都是关键一击。

trait.name: Evasion
entries: 如果 "钉子袋 "受到的效果允许他做一个灵巧的蓄力动作，只受到一半的伤害，如果蓄力动作成功，"钉子袋 "就不会受到伤害，如果失败，则只受到一半的伤害。

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: 当钉子袋用武器攻击击中目标并在攻击卷上有优势时，或者当目标在他的盟友5英尺范围内，而钉子袋在攻击卷上没有劣势时，会造成额外的14（（%0%））伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 钉子袋进行了两次短剑攻击。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害，目标必须做一个{@dc 15}宪法救赎，救赎失败时受到24 ({@damage 7d6})的毒药伤害，救赎成功时受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害，目标必须做一个{@dc 15}宪法救赎，救赎失败会受到24({@damage 7d6})的毒药伤害，救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。

items.name: Special Equipment
entries: 博斯克穿的是（%0%）。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Chwinga的先天法术能力是智慧。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何材料或语言成分。

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: Chwinga不需要空气、食物或饮料。当它死后，它会变成一把花瓣，一团花粉，一个类似于它以前的石像，一个光滑的小石球，或者一滩淡水（你选择）。

trait.name: Evasion
entries: 当chwinga受到一个允许它做出灵巧救赎的效果，只受到一半的伤害时，如果救赎成功，它就不会受到伤害，如果失败，就只受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Magical Gift (1/Day)
entries: Chwinga的目标是它能看到的5英尺范围内的一个人形生物。目标获得一个由DM选择的（%0%）。关于超自然符咒的更多信息，请参见《地牢大师指南》的（%1%）。

action.name: Natural Shelter
entries: 温加人在其空间内的岩石、活体植物或天然淡水源中神奇地躲避。在这个庇护所内，温加人不能被任何攻击、法术或其他效果所针对，而且庇护所也不会影响温加人的视线。温加尔人可以使用它的行动来从庇护所中出来。如果它的庇护所被摧毁，那么chwinga会被迫出来并出现在庇护所的空间里，但除此之外没有受到伤害。

trait.name: Climbing
entries: 角斗士可以爬上困难的表面，包括倒立在天花板上，而不需要进行能力检查。

trait.name: Steadfast
entries: 角斗士不能被解除武装，也不能进行远程攻击。

trait.name: Brute
entries: 一个近战武器在角斗士用它击中时，会造成一个额外的伤害模子（包括在攻击中）。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 角斗士进行三次近战攻击。

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺伤害，如果双手使用，则为13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})重击伤害。如果目标是中等或较小的生物，它必须成功地进行{@dc 15}力量投掷，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 角斗士在对抗一次会击中它的近战攻击时，会在自己的AC上加3。要做到这一点，角斗士必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Divine Health
entries: 龙饵对疾病有免疫力。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: While holding his {@item holy avenger longsword}, Dragonbait creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around him. While this aura is active, Dragonbait and all creatures friendly to him in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dragonbait makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Holy Avenger (+3 Longsword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage when used with two hands. If the target is a fiend or an undead it takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) radiant damage.

action.name: Sense Alignment
entries: Dragonbait chooses one creature he can see within 60 feet of him and determines its alignment, as long as the creature isn't hidden from divination magic by a spell or other magical effect.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eblis's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 11}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eblis attacks twice with its beak.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The flying monkey has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the monkey's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: With the DM's permission, the {@spell find familiar} spell can summon a flying monkey.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) piercing damage.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargoyle makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The turtle can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Stable
entries: Whenever an effect knocks the turtle {@condition prone}, it can make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw to avoid being knocked {@condition prone}. A {@condition prone} turtle is upside down. To stand up, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity check on its turn and then use all its movement for that turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the zombie can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zombie makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Hew has resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of his turn, Hew can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The jaculi has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The jaculi has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spring
entries: The jaculi springs up to 30 feet in a straight line and makes a bite attack against a target within its reach. This attack has advantage if the jaculi springs at least 10 feet. If the attack hits, the bite deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The kamadan has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the kamadan moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is knocked {@condition prone}, the kamadan can make two attacks—one with its bite and one with its snakes—against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kamadan makes two attacks: one with its bite or claw and one with its snakes.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Snakes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Sleep Breath (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The kamadan exhales sleep gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes. This effect ends for a creature if it takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The King of Feathers's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spell, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Detect Invisibility
entries: The King of Feathers can see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects as if they were visible.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the King of Feathers fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The King of Feathers makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Summon Swarm {@recharge 5}
entries: The King of Feathers exhales a {@creature swarm of wasps||swarm of insects (wasps)} that forms in a space within 20 feet of it. The swarm acts as an ally of the King of Feathers and takes its turn immediately after it. The swarm disperses after 1 minute. It can't use the Summon Swarm action while it is grappling a creature with its jaws.

items.name: Special Equipment
entries: Laskilar wears a {@item cape of the mountebank}.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Liara has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Flaming Fury
entries: Once per turn, when Liara hits a creature with a melee weapon, she can cause fire to magically erupt from her weapon and deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage to the target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Liara makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage when used with two hands.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Attractive Pollen (1/Day)
entries: When the mantrap detects any creatures nearby, it can use its reaction to release pollen out to a radius of 30 feet. Any beast or humanoid within the area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to use all its movement on its turns to get as close to the the mantrap as possible. An affected target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the mantrap remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary tropical plant.

action.name: Engulf
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}The target is trapped inside the mantrap's leafy jaws. While trapped in this way, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, has total cover from an attacks and other effects outside the mantrap, and takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the target's turns. If the mantrap dies, the creature inside it is no longer {@condition restrained} by it. A mantrap can engulf only one creature at a time.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mwaxanaré is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). She regains her expended spell slots when she finishes a short or long rest. She knows the following warlock spells:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit. reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Terror Dive
entries: If the pterafolk is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target, and then hits that target with a melee weapon attack, the target is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pterafolk makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. Alternatively, it makes two melee attacks with its javelin.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

hp.special: 127 ({@dice 17d8 + 51}) reduced to 107; subtract 1 for each day that passes during the adventure

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ras Nsi's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ras Nsi is an 11th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks).
Ras Nsi has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Ras Nsi wears {@item bracers of defense}, wields a {@item flame tongue longsword}, and carries a {@item sending stones||sending stone} matched to the one carried by the guide Salida (see chapter 1).

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: Ras Nsi can use his action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into his yuan-ti form. His statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. He doesn't change form if he dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Ras Nsi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ras Nsi makes three melee attacks, but can use Constrict only once.

action.name: Bite (Snake Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and Ras Nsi can't constrict another target.

action.name: Flame Tongue Longsword (Yuan-ti Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

items.name: Spider Climb
entries: The skeleton can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes two dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Spiked Tomb Guardian

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the tomb guardian starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the tomb guardian goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the tomb guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the tomb guardian attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the tomb guardian goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk tomb guardian, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The tomb guardian must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a {@dc 15} Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the tomb guardian ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the tomb guardian might go berserk again.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the tomb guardian takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The tomb guardian is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the tomb guardian is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tomb guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Chained
entries: {@note This trait applies when two guardians are chained together.}

A magical spiked chain that binds a pair of guardians together prevents them from moving more than 15 feet apart. Additionally, as long as the chain is intact, damage dealt to either guardian is divided evenly between them. The spiked chain can be attacked separately and has AC 18, a damage threshold of 10, 5 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. If the chain breaks, both tomb guardians instantly go berserk.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tomb guardian makes two spiked gauntlet attacks.

action.name: Spiked Gauntlet
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

walk.condition: (in one direction chosen at the start of its turn)

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

trait.name: Devastating Roll
entries: The juggernaut can move through the space of a {@condition prone} creature. A creature whose space the juggernaut enters for the first time on a turn must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The juggernaut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: As long as it has 1 hit point left, the juggernaut magically regains all its hit points daily at dawn. The juggernaut is destroyed and doesn't regenerate if it drops to 0 hit points.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The juggernaut deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The su-monster makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage, or 12 ({@damage 4d4 + 2}) slashing damage if the su-monster is hanging by its tail and all four of its limbs are free.

action.name: Psychic Crush {@recharge 5}
entries: The su-monster targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The {@condition stunned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Feline Agility
entries: When the tabaxi moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, the tabaxi can't use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tabaxi makes two attacks with its claws, its shortsword, or its shortbow.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Feline Agility
entries: When the tabaxi moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, the tabaxi can't use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

trait.name: Inspire (1/Day)
entries: While taking a short rest, the tabaxi can spend 1 minute singing, playing an instrument, telling a story, or reciting a poem to soothe and inspire creatures other than itself. Up to five creatures of the tabaxi's choice that can see and hear its performance gain 8 temporary hit points at the end of the tabaxi's short rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tabaxi makes two claws attacks or two dart attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/ 60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

items.name: False Appearance
entries: While the terracotta warrior remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a terracotta statue.

items.name: Fragile
entries: If a critical hit is scored against the terracotta warrior, it shatters and is destroyed.

items.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Tomb Dwarf

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the tomb dwarf has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tomb dwarf makes two longsword attacks or two crossbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the tomb dwarf's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The tomb dwarf can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Tomb Guardian

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the tomb guardian starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the tomb guardian goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the tomb guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the tomb guardian attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the tomb guardian goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk tomb guardian, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The tomb guardian must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a {@dc 15} Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the tomb guardian ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the tomb guardian might go berserk again.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the tomb guardian takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The tomb guardian is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the tomb guardian is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tomb guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tomb guardian makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tri-flower frond uses its orange blossom, then its yellow blossom, and then its red blossom.

action.name: Orange Blossom
entries: The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target is {@condition unconscious}. At the end of each minute, the {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Yellow Blossom
entries: The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, or it is covered with corrosive sap and takes 5 acid damage at the start of each of its turns. Dousing the target with water reduces the acid damage by 1 point per pint or flask of water used.

action.name: Red Blossom
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The red blossom can grapple only one target at a time. Another creature within reach of the tri-flower frond can use its action to end the grapple on the target.

trait.name: Disgorge Zombie
entries: As a bonus action, the tyrannosaurus zombie can disgorge a normal {@creature zombie}, which appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of it. The disgorged {@creature zombie} acts on its own initiative count. After a zombie is disgorged, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1, the tyrannosaurus zombie runs out of zombies to disgorge and loses this trait. If the tyrannosaurus zombie still has this trait when it dies, {@dice 1d4} normal zombies erupt from its corpse at the start of its next turn. These zombies act on their own initiative count.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the tyrannosaurus zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tyrannosaurus zombie makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the tyrannosaurus zombie can't bite another target or disgorge zombies.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Valindra is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). Valindra has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Mask
entries: As a bonus action, Valindra can mask her shriveled flesh and appear to be a living elf. This magical illusion lasts until she ends it as a bonus action or until she uses her Frightening Gaze legendary action. The effect also ends if Valindra drops to 30 hit points or fewer, or if {@spell dispel magic} is cast on her.

trait.name: Preparation
entries: When preparing her spells, Valindra can swap out any spell on her list of prepared spells for another wizard spell of the same level.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Valindra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If destroyed Valindra gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: Valindra has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Valindra casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Valindra uses her Paralyzing Touch.

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Valindra fixes her gaze on one creature she can see within 10 feet of her. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the Valindra's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of Valindra must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Volo is a 1st-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Withers

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: the languages he knew in life

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Withers is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Withers has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Withers carries the {@item amulet of the black skull|ToA}.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Withers has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Withers makes two longsword attacks. He can use his Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the Withers's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. Withers can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Xandala is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Xandala has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Quickened Spell (3/Day)
entries: When she casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, Xandala changes the casting time to 1 bonus action for that casting.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the creeper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary flowering vine.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The creeper regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the creeper takes fire, necrotic, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The creeper dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage. If the target is a humanoid that drops to 0 hit points as a result of this damage, it dies and is implanted with a yellow musk creeper bulb. Unless the bulb is destroyed, the corpse animates as a yellow musk zombie after being dead for 24 hours. The bulb is destroyed if the creature is raised from the dead before it can transform into a yellow musk zombie, or if the corpse is targeted by a {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic before it animates.

action.name: Yellow Musk (3/Day)
entries: The creeper's flowers release a strong musk that targets all humanoids within 30 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the creeper for 1 minute. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way does nothing on its turn except move as close as it can to the creeper. A creature {@condition charmed} by the creeper can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 +the damage taken, unless the damage is fire or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)
headerEntries: The yuan-ti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zindar is a 14th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Zindar knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Dragon Wings
entries: As a bonus action on his turn, Zindar can sprout a pair of dragon wings from his back, gaining a flying speed of 30 feet until he dismisses them as a bonus action.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: Zindar uses one of the following options:

action.name: Fire Breath
entries: Zindar exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Weakening Breath
entries: Zindar exhales gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The zorbo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Natural Armor
entries: The zorbo magically absorbs the natural strength of its surroundings, adjusting its Armor Class based on the material it is standing or climbing on: AC 15 for wood or bone, AC 17 for earth or stone, or AC 19 for metal. If the zorbo isn't in contact with any of these substances, its AC is 10.

action.name: Destructive Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature wearing armor, carrying a shield, or in possession of a magic item that improves its AC, it must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, one such item worn or carried by the creature (the target's choice) magically deteriorates, taking a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers, and the zorbo gains a +1 bonus to AC until the start of its next turn. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield or magic item that drops to a 0 AC increase is destroyed.
